body:
Folks,

UI-IDL Boise has openings for intern positions. This position is open
for all, not only for current (grad) students. Both positions
potentially come with a tuition fee waiver for a graduate program at
Univ of Idaho.

Informal questions can be directed to myself (eryd at uidaho.edu) or Gunnar
Gladics (gunnarg at uidaho.edu).

The links are below for mechanical engineering and architectural interns.

Ery

************************

Mech.
https://www.sites.uidaho.edu/AppTrack/Agency/Applicant/ViewAnnouncement.asp?announcement_no=24104060362

Arch.

subject: [Radiance-general] Openings at UI-IDL Boise
